attributes.action: Allow the 22nd Anual Bulldog Bash to take place as it has dont for the last 21 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Save the Bulldog Bash in Warwickshire, from Objection to hold this years event!!! Help stop it being Cancelled!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
